attributes.action: Ban the introduction of smart meters
attributes.additional_details:
Smart meters are extremely bad for your health in respect of the RF output. Much worse than a mobile phone against the side of your head for 24 hrs per day.
They are also an intrusion into our private lives to an unprecedented degree. They will transmit information as to what you have turned on and off and when, even down to your toaster.
This is the most intrusive big brother exercise contemplated so far and must be stopped before it starts.
All properties must be fitted with these devises by 2020 by government decree - this must be debated again especially in relation to the health issues.
